models.name: AI-Native Local Courier/Delivery Operations
models.one_liner: AI-native local courier/delivery: route optimization, demand prediction, dynamic pricing, fleet management. NAICS 492210: 177K employees, 9K establishments. Same-day delivery demand growing 20%+ annually. AI handles route optimization (30-40% fuel savings) + predictive demand staffing. Different from DoorDash (food) — B2B local delivery (medical samples, legal docs, parts).

models.name: AI-Enhanced Small Farm Operations
models.one_liner: AI BENEFICIARY: Small/specialty farms (not commodity row crop) enhanced by AI: pest/disease detection via phone camera, irrigation optimization, market price monitoring, harvest timing, regulatory compliance (organic/GAP). Davis CA location = direct access to UC Davis ag AI research and Central Valley growers. Jevons: AI makes precision agriculture accessible to 50-acre farms, not just 5000-acre operations.

models.name: AI Operations Platform for Home/Elder Care Agencies
models.one_liner: SaaS+AI platform for 925K elder care agencies: caregiver scheduling, EVV compliance, care plan management, family portal, Medicaid billing. Current tools (ClearCare, Axxess) are pre-AI. Gap: AI-native platform that predicts staffing needs, automates compliance, and coordinates across providers.

models.name: AI-Enhanced Agricultural Equipment Manufacturing
models.one_liner: Manufacture AI-enhanced farm equipment: autonomous implements, precision application systems -- AI builds the tools that modernize agriculture

models.name: AI Supply Chain Platform for Modernized Manufacturers
models.one_liner: SUPPLY CHAIN: As manufacturing shops modernize (our top models), their supply chain must adapt. AI platform for industrial distributors: predictive reordering based on manufacturer production schedules, quality tracking across suppliers, just-in-time optimization. Connects upgraded manufacturers to upgraded suppliers.

models.name: AI-Native Travel Advisory Service Revival
models.one_liner: DEAD BUSINESS REVIVAL: Traditional travel agencies killed by Expedia/Booking. But complex travel (group, luxury, multi-destination, corporate) still needs human judgment. AI-native travel advisory: AI handles research/booking/logistics, human handles relationship/preferences/problem-solving. At $99/trip (vs $500+ traditional agent), Jevons: 5x more travelers use advisory services.

models.name: AI Analytics for Sports Teams/Organizations
models.one_liner: AI analytics for sports organizations: player performance prediction, injury prevention, fan engagement, ticket pricing, sponsorship valuation. NAICS 711211: 109K employees, 3.5K establishments, $266K avg pay. MLB/NFL/NBA at cutting edge but minor leagues, college sports, international leagues underserved. Jevons: AI analytics accessible to every high school team.

models.name: AI Operations Platform for Landscaping Companies
models.one_liner: SaaS+AI platform for 122K landscaping companies: satellite property measurement, instant quoting, route optimization, crew management, invoicing. Current tools (Jobber, ServiceTitan) are generic field service — no landscaping-specific AI. At 5K users: predict seasonal demand, optimize equipment utilization across customers.

models.name: AI-Native Photo/Video Post-Production Service
models.one_liner: DEAD BUSINESS REVIVAL: Photo labs died with digital. But demand for professional post-production (color grading, retouching, compositing) surging with social media/e-commerce. AI handles 90% of post-production (auto color, background removal, upscaling). Full-service at $5-20/image vs $50-200 traditional. Jevons: every e-commerce seller gets professional product photos.

models.name: AI Parts Intelligence for Auto Repair Modernization
models.one_liner: SUPPLY CHAIN: As auto repair shops modernize (our AM-AUTO models), parts procurement becomes data-rich. AI parts intelligence: predictive reordering, cross-reference optimization, counterfeit detection, pricing comparison. Every repair generates parts consumption data. At scale: predict parts demand by vehicle age/model/region weeks in advance.

models.name: AI Food Distribution Intelligence for Modernized Producers
models.one_liner: SUPPLY CHAIN: As specialty food producers modernize (our AM-FOOD models), distribution becomes the bottleneck. AI food distribution: demand forecasting, spoilage prediction, cold chain optimization, retailer matching. NAICS 424490+424410: 500K employees. Connects AI-modernized food producers to distributors to retailers. Data from production + distribution + retail = compound intelligence.

models.name: AI Warehouse Operations Platform
models.one_liner: AI operations platform for warehousing. NAICS 493110: 1.73M employees, 17K establishments. AI handles: inventory optimization, pick path optimization, demand forecasting, workforce scheduling. Robotics integration for automated picking. Amazon sets the bar but 17K independent warehouses lack these capabilities. $51K avg pay — massive labor cost to optimize.

models.name: Auto Repair Intelligence Platform (Data Compounding)
models.one_liner: Start as diagnostics service for independent shops, compound into definitive repair pattern database. Every vehicle serviced adds to diagnostic accuracy. At scale: predict failures before they happen, optimize parts inventory across network. Mitchell/AllData incumbents are static databases — AI-native system learns from every repair.

models.name: Equipment Reliability Intelligence (Data Compounding)
models.one_liner: Start with AI-augmented equipment repair, compound into definitive equipment failure pattern database. Every repair generates: failure mode, time-to-failure, parts consumed, environmental conditions. At 100K repairs: predict failures weeks before they happen. At 1M: become the predictive maintenance intelligence layer for industrial equipment.

models.name: AI Operations Platform for Beauty/Salon Industry
models.one_liner: Platform for beauty/salon industry: AI booking, client preference learning, inventory optimization, social media content generation. Fresha, Vagaro exist but limited AI. Gap: AI-native platform that actually generates social content and predicts trends.

models.name: AI Operations Platform for Property Managers
models.one_liner: Platform for 98K property management companies: AI tenant screening, predictive maintenance, automated rent collection, compliance tracking. AppFolio ($7B) validates market but limited AI. Gap: AI-native platform purpose-built for SMB managers (5-50 units).

models.name: AI Operations Platform for Self-Storage
models.one_liner: AI operations for self-storage facilities: dynamic pricing, demand forecasting, automated move-in/move-out, security monitoring, marketing optimization. NAICS 531130: 59K employees, 18K establishments. Public Storage/Extra Space dominate REITs but thousands of independent operators. Storeganise and similar exist but pre-AI.

models.name: AI Platform for Furniture/Home Furnishings Retail
models.one_liner: AI for furniture/home retailers: AR room visualization, inventory optimization, customer preference learning, delivery route optimization. NAICS 449210: 415K employees, est. 30K establishments. Wayfair ($12B) at online but physical furniture retail (70% of sales) still analog. AI bridges online visualization with in-store experience.

models.name: Specialized Freight Intelligence (Post-Convoy Lesson)
models.one_liner: FAILURE STUDY: Convoy ($900M failure) tried to be Uber-for-freight in general trucking — marketplace without differentiation. Lesson: general freight matching is commoditized. Opportunity: SPECIALIZED freight intelligence (cold chain, hazmat, oversized, high-value) where domain expertise creates data moat. Focus on 1-2 specialized segments, not general marketplace.
